name: Toned Milk
description: Heritage Toned Milk is a low-fat milk with a creamy taste. It is perfect for those who prefer a lighter milk option without compromising on nutrition.

name: Full Cream Milk
description: Heritage Full Cream Milk is rich and creamy, providing a wholesome and nourishing experience. Enjoy the natural goodness of full cream milk in every sip.

description: Heritage Standardized Milk offers a balanced combination of taste and nutrition. It undergoes a standardization process to deliver consistent quality and taste.

name: Double Toned Milk
description: Heritage Double Toned Milk is a low-fat milk variant that is ideal for those looking for a healthier option. It has a lighter texture without compromising on essential nutrients.

name: Cow Milk
description: Heritage Cow Milk is sourced from carefully selected cows, ensuring the highest quality and freshness. It offers a rich and creamy taste for your daily consumption.

name: Slim Milk
description: Heritage Slim Milk is a low-fat milk option designed to support a healthy lifestyle. It is perfect for those who want to enjoy milk while keeping their calorie intake in check.

name: A2 Full Cream Milk
description: Heritage A2 Full Cream Milk is sourced from pure A2 cow milk, known for its rich flavor and health benefits. Experience the goodness of traditional A2 milk in every glass.
